sub_title: Data Warehouse consultant / Business Intelligence / Data modeller /Data analyst / Business Analyst
summary: Dedicated professional with experience in the Information Technology (IT) industry, including data warehouse, database, ETL and business analysis, as well as working directly with customers in a consulting capacity throughout the full software life cycle.

projects.title: FRAAI ( Finance & Risk Architecture Alignment Initiative)
projects.description:
FRAAI is the blueprint for integrating Finance & Risk processes, information and systems. The FRAAI architecture is based on the below design principles.
	Integrated services
	Apply uniform standardization
	Transparent accountability
	Sustainable and cost-effective solutions
	Act at the right time and right place
	One common language
	Single source of fact.

contributors.headline: Data Warehouse consultant / Business Intelligence / Data modeller /Data analyst / Business Analyst

projects.title: MDL Basel chain Reporting
projects.description:
Customer : ABN AMRO
Project : MDL Basel chain Reporting 
Description of project :The overall project objective is to deliver a process that creates data reports in order to comply with mandatory regulatory requirements for BASEL II reporting .
The purpose of the project is complying with mandatory reporting needs concerning credit risk en with requirements for internal reporting of ABN AMRO N-share.
The MDL Basel system delivers various types of information for Basel reporting purposes. These reports are presented to De Nederlandsche Bank by ABN AMRO Bank N.V., which in turn evaluates the given information along the lines of the Basel 3 accords. The Basel 3 accords are a framework of international agreements in which certain credit risk’s that banks face are addressed. Additionally, the Basel 3 accords state how much capital a bank should possess in order to counter the risks they may face
• Translating the Functional Business requirements in to IT Technical Design and implementing the change requests 
• Working closely with functional analyst in gathering the requirements and transforming it to technical design for IT systems 
• Involved in Design ,Planning ,Coordinating and executing Basel chain change requests 
• End to end responsibility of project starting from requirement gathering ,Technical design , business logic and testing
• Experience in Resource management and handling various teams( TBA , Dev and Testing ) of project 
• Worked as Project Leader of Basel chain for TCS 
• Worked on proposals for client in reducing  the run timings  of Basel IT system 
• ETL Powercenter performance engineering 
• Business Knowledge of Basel credit risk ,BDWM model,data warehouse concepts , Unix ,ETL Informatica Powercenter

contributors.headline: Data Warehouse consultant / Business Intelligence / Data modeller /Data analyst / Business Analyst

projects.title: ADW[ABN AMRO Data Warehouse] – Project HKU[Herbouw Kredieten Universe] & CTL[Closing The Loop]
projects.description:
HKU and CTL is one of the first projects that is going to make use of the new data warehouse development street, the so-called ADW (ABN AMRO Data warehouse). The tooling to support this street has currently been set up by the DEWI project; allowing business analysts to fill in G3 spreadsheets that can be automatically migrated to Power enter workflows, capable of executing basic ETL (Entry-Transform-Load) activities populating the data warehouse environment.

Highlights :

•	As a project member I was responsible for the design and development of the project in ETL Powercenter
•	Detailed analysis of the business requirements.
•	Map the business requirements to IT requirements.
•	Design, code and test the modifications/enhancements required for meeting the requirements.
•	Optimizing the ETL Informatica Powercenter components
•	We had success with numerous deliveries and in a timely and quality conscious manner.

contributors.headline: Data Warehouse consultant / Business Intelligence / Data modeller /Data analyst / Business Analyst

projects.title: Theatrical Online Business Intelligence (TOBI) Support
projects.description:
Project description :

TOBI (Theatrical Online Business Intelligence) is a decision support and analysis system based on data warehousing technology. It deals with data related to Theatrical Business which is classified into different subject areas such as Invoice, Payments, Accounts Receivable, Bookings/Contracts and Print Movement. It is an OLAP System having MACCS (a third party OLTP System) as its source. The project works in two stages: ETL Design (where data for all the territorial contracts, bookings and invoices from MACCS is loaded into the data warehouse using ETL Powercenter ) and Reporting (where global and territory specific reports are developed for better information and enhanced reporting to the senior management as well as theatrical territories using Business Objects).

Highlights :

•	Development & maintenance of ETL Informatica Powercenter Components .
•	Creation of table definitions in Oracle database.
•	Monitoring daily jobs running in production environment and debugging issues when required.
•	Performing unit testing and integration testingDesign/SRS

including data warehouse, database, ETL and business analysis, as well as working directly with customers in a consulting
